text: There are several references to the word Moreh: * Moreh, India is a small town in Manipur, India, bordering Myanmar * Elon Moreh, the first Israeli settlement in the Samarian Hills after the Six-Day War * Moreh is a location mentioned in the Torah. * Shmuel Moreh (1932–2017), Iraqi Jewish author and professor of Arabic literature at the Hebrew University
title: Moreh (disambiguation)
